author: James Martin
method: Heat the oil in a deep, heavy-bottomed pan. It is ready when a breadcrumb that is dropped in will sizzle gently in it. (CAUTION: hot oil can be dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Deep fry the tortilla strips for one minute until golden. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen towel. Serve in a large warm bowl and dust with icing sugar.
ingredients: 500ml/18fl oz vegetable oil ,  3 flour tortillas, rolled up and sliced into strips,  50g/2oz icing sugar, for dusting
